Package net.java.jddac.jmdi.fblock

Provides various Function Blocks used in Java Measurement Dataflow Interface (JMDI).

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ReportImageInterface  
ServerDataInterface  
 

Class Summary
BasicNCAPBlock This is an instantiation of the NCAPBlock class.
BasicTIM Abstract class providing basic TIM functionality.
BasicTransducerBlock  
ConfigureBlock Provides probe configuration services.
DbConMgrBlock Manages connections to a database.
EchoBlock This function block subscribes to a publication topic and publishes on a second topic.
ErrorChannelSplitter Splits an incoming measurement stream into a stream for measurement values and one for error values.
FederationBlock Accepts startup notifications for public JDDAC servers.
FunctionBlock FunctionBlock abstraction from IEEE 1451.1 standard.
GaasPubBlock  
GenericArgArrayStoreBlock Provides methods to access a pair of database tables.
GenericStoreBlock Provides methods to access a pair of database tables.
JddacServerDataBlock  
JFreeChartBlock Uses JFreeChart library to plot measurements..
LogAdminBlock  
LogJdbcHandlerBlock Insert log entries into database
MeasInfoBlock An implementation of the GenericStoreBlock that stores a measurement from a probe in each record.
MeasStoreBlock Provides measurement persistence services.
MessageQueueBlock This function block queues messages that are destined for probes until the probe checks in.
MetadataStoreBlock Provides metadata persistence services.
MiniAlarmBlock This is a simple example of an alarm block.
NCAPBlock Represents NCAP abstraction from IEEE 1451.1.
NRSSBlock Generates NRSS Feed for measurements.
ProbeBlock An implementation of the GenericArgArrayStoreBlock that stores a probe in each record.
PubDiagBlock Simple FunctionBlock that receives and prints publications.
RecordStoreBlock Manages information about a Record of Measurements.
RenamePubBlock This function block subscribes to one or more publication topics and republishes any received pubs to another topic.
ReportDbAccess Provides configurable access to database.
Reporter Queues messages.
ReportOnChangeBlock Examines the incoming measurement values and see if it has changed since the last publication.
ReportStoreBlock This Function FunctionBlock stores user defined reports.
ServerInfoBlock Runs at server startup.
ServerMessageStore Basic implementation of a MessageStore interface used by the Transport framework.
SystemSetupBlock Runs at system startup.
TransportBridgeBlock Serves as the glue that connects the Transport mechanism with the intra-VM communication fabric on the server.
UserBlock Provides user account management capabilities.
 

Package net.java.jddac.jmdi.fblock Description

Provides various Function Blocks used in Java Measurement Dataflow Interface (JMDI).
